previews.commit_message:
feat: Implement Content Reference Picker with relation widgets

- Migrated venues from data file to content collection, enabling CMS editing.
- Added relation widgets for teams, events, results, and posts to facilitate content linking.
- Created a reference validation system to ensure all content references are valid at build time.
- Updated multiple templates to utilize new reference resolution and maintain backward compatibility.
- Migrated existing content to new path format, ensuring all references are explicit and self-documenting.
- Created example content for teams, events, results, and posts to demonstrate new features.
- Added documentation for the new content reference picker feature and updated related archetypes.
